titles.title: Know Ye Not, Know Ye Not, Ye Are The Temple

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Know ye not, know ye not ye are the temple?
Know ye not, know ye not ye are the temple?
Know ye not, know ye not ye are the temple?
Ye are the temple of the Holy Ghost.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Filled with praise, filled with power,
Filled with glory,
Filled with praise, filled with power,
Filled with glory,
Filled with praise, filled with power,
Filled with glory,
Ye are the temple of the Holy Ghost.
